plot: A bored detective is accused of murdering... himself. A film for anyone who's ever felt that the world is - absurdly, resolutely - against them.
title: Bloomkampf
plot_es: A bored detective is accused of murdering... himself. A film for anyone who's ever felt that the world is - absurdly, resolutely - against them.
plot_en: A bored detective is accused of murdering... himself. A film for anyone who's ever felt that the world is - absurdly, resolutely - against them.
